con:interface.name: PMS BCIP
con:interface.con:description: PMS Business Configuration and Information Protocol

con:request.name: Request 1
con:request.con:request: <OfferDefinitions> <OfferDefinition Description="Base for offer OnDemand Voice Flat" MajorPriority="80" MinorPriority="80" ProductCapability="0" ProductOfferingName="OnDemandVoiceFlat" TimeSecondResolutionCapability="0" StartDateUpdateDuringRemovalProtectionPeriodAllowed="0" EnableAtProvisioning="0" EndOfProvisioning="0" BreakChargingIntervalsOnDa="1" OfferValidThroughoutInterrogation="1" FeeCapable="0" ProvisionCapable="0" Depletable="0"> <AttributeDefinitions> <AttributeDefinition Name="ADMINExternalProductIdentifier" Type="String" IncludeCCR="true" Value="dummy"/> <AttributeDefinition Name="CFSSID" Type="String" IncludeCCR="true" Value="dummy"/> <AttributeDefinition Name="POID" Type="String" IncludeCCR="true" Value="dummy"/> <AttributeDefinition Name="ServiceType" Type="Integer" Value="1"/> </AttributeDefinitions> <OfferResourceConnection ResourceFacingService="common.home.voice" IncludeMainAccount="0" DedicatedAccountSelectionRule="0"> <OfferConnectedDedicatedAccountList> <OfferConnectedDedicatedAccount DedicatedAccountId="11101" DedicatedAccountPriority="10"/> <OfferConnectedDedicatedAccount DedicatedAccountId="11100" DedicatedAccountPriority="30"/> <OfferConnectedDedicatedAccount DedicatedAccountId="11103" DedicatedAccountPriority="20"/> </OfferConnectedDedicatedAccountList> </OfferResourceConnection> <TemplateTrees> <TemplateTree RatingPlan="OnDemand_Voice_Flat" ServiceProvider="RatingTemplate"> <TreeParameter Name="VoiceRural" > <DecimalValue>1.0</DecimalValue> </TreeParameter> <TreeParameter Name="VoiceOnNet" > <DecimalValue>3.0</DecimalValue> </TreeParameter> <TreeParameter Name="VoiceOffNet" > <DecimalValue>3.0</DecimalValue> </TreeParameter> <TreeParameter Name="VoiceVoicemail" > <DecimalValue>1.0</DecimalValue> </TreeParameter> </TemplateTree> </TemplateTrees> </OfferDefinition> </OfferDefinitions>
